Texts.Chs: 在升级^orange;加工台^reset;后制造^orange;基因提取器^reset;是一个好主意，因为它工作起来比植物分析台^green;快得多reset;！ 实际上，每一种植物种子都可以放在种子实验室中，每一种都会产生^green;基因reset;。
Texts.Eng: Constructing a ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; upon upgrading your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; is a good idea, as they are ^green;much faster^reset;! Effectively every plant seed can be placed within seed labs, and each one will produce ^green;Genes^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 所以你已经建好了^orange;植物分析台^reset;？但你为什么看起来毫无头绪？很简单：扔一个^orange;土豆种子^reset;进去，大约60秒后你会得到^green;基因^reset;，对你的植物学研究或其他产品很有用处。
Texts.Eng: So you've built a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset;? Why are you looking so clueless? It's simple: Toss in a ^orange;Potato Seed^reset; and wait about 60 seconds. You'll get a useful ^green;Gene^reset; for your botany research, or other goods
